original_text: Moses turned and went down the mountain with the two tablets of the covenant law in his hands. They were inscribed on both sides, front and back.
korean_text: 모세가 돌이켜 산에서 내려오는데 두 증거판이 그의 손에 있고 그 판의 양면 이쪽 저쪽에 글자가 있으니

sentences.original_text: Moses turned and went down the mountain
with the two tablets of the covenant law in his hands
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 손에 언약법의 두 돌판을 들고

sentences.original_text: They were inscribed on both sides
